title: Impeachment, Kobe Bryant, 2020, Coronavirus
itunes:title: Impeachment, Kobe Bryant, 2020, Coronavirus
description:
Panel guests: Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative Media

and Matt Gorman, Vice President at Targeted Victory & Former NRCC Communications Director.


Kevin and the panel also spoke with Eben Novy-Williams, Bloomberg Sports Business Reporter & co-host of the Bloomberg Business of Sports Podcast about the tragic helicopter crash that killed Kobe Bryant, his daughter Gianna and 7 others in California on Sunday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
